name: PharmaChoice - Drumbo
comment:
General pharmacy
  • medication placed in blister packs (sealed, push-through packaging used to separate doses) for a set fee
  • medication placed in pill organizers (containers for storing scheduled doses)
  • basic home health care supplies
  • home health care supplies (incontinence and ostomy products - special order)
  • blood pressure monitors
  • free seasonal flu vaccine by appointment
  • treatment and prescription of medications for common medical ailments, including rashes, pink eye, insect bites, acne, and urinary tract infections

MedsCheck - Appointments to review complex prescriptions with a pharmacist
serviceProvisionCode: Dispensing fee plus medication costs * prescribed medications may be covered by OHIP
